item.title: Smart Contracts
item.description:
Smart contracts are piece of code that is present in the blockchain (everyone’s node) and users can interact with them using transactions.

Usually smart contracts will be used to store some data like balance of an user, with access control of who can update or modify the data that is stored in smart contract.
